Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: AI CardNews Generator

- 5-card structure \(HOOK → EMPATHY → PROBLEM → SOLUTION → CTA\)
- 8 domains support \(병원/의료, 선거/정치, 교육, 부동산, 금융/보험, 뷰티/미용, 음식/요식업, 직접입력\)
- Google Gemini API integration
- Dynamic keywords based on domain/age/job
- PNG download via html2canvas
- Standalone HTML+JS version for local use
- Next.js version with TypeScript

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
